title: srdedupe: Risk-controlled, reproducible deduplication of bibliographic records for evidence syntheses
description: A Python package for scalable deduplication of bibliographic records (e.g., RIS exports and PubMed NBIB/MEDLINE-tagged records). The software implements a conservative, audit-friendly pipeline that separates candidate generation (high recall) from duplicate decisions (false-positive control), and produces machine-readable artifacts for traceability (run manifests, decision rationales, and review queues).
notes: For citation information, see CITATION.cff in the repository.
